pageContent: Purpose: To assess T2W and dynamic: contrast-enhanced (DCE) MR imaging in the detection of local tumor recurrence after transrectal high-intensity focused US (HIFU) treatment.

metaData.source:
Noninvasive Ablation of Prostate Cancer Spheroids Using Acoustically-Activated Nanodroplets
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27696857/
